Welcome to the Redhill Aeroclub

The Club

Redhill Aero Club is based at Redhill Aerodrome in Surrey. We are a not for profit organisation created to promote leisure aviation and aerial sport. Membership is open to all whether you are a qualified pilot, learning to fly, an aircraft owner or simply have an interest in aviation and want to enjoy the club experience. The intent of club is for members to share a mutual interest in aviation through organised fly-outs, social evenings with guest speakers, summer barbecues and to have regular social events that make the club a great place to visit.

Cubair Flight Training

Be the pilot for the day!

Ever dreamt of flying a plane? Make your dream a reality with this Pilot for a Day Flying Experience for one. Get an incredible insight into what it’s like to operate a plane as a private pilot. With an instructor guiding you through it all, you’ll be totally immersed in every step of the experience, from deciding a route, inspecting and preparing the aircraft for flight, and then taking to the skies!


Livestream

Watch out from the hangar 8 in Redhill and see what is happening. It is great for a live weather check and convienet for checking if you aircraft is back to the parking.

Redhill Airport official weather page is also available.
